project.description: This job will redeploy the d3.cloud - it will wipe all (three) d3 machines.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: WITHREBOOT
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Enable reboots during the mkcloud run (incl. crowbar and compute node).

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: add update repos before crowbar install

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TESTHEAD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: if non-empty, test latest version from Devel:Cloud Staging

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: libvirt_type
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: possible values: kvm, xen, hyperv, [ lxc, qemu ]

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: networkingplugin
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: neutron networking plugin: openvswitch|linuxbridge Default: openvswitch

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
n=3 admin=admin$((n+1)) cloud=d$n nodenumber=2 tempestoptions="-t"
if [ ! -z "$UPDATEREPOS" ] ; then # testing update only makes sense with GMx and without TESTHEAD unset TESTHEAD export UPDATEREPOS=${UPDATEREPOS//$'\n'/+} fi
export artifacts_dir=$WORKSPACE/.artifacts rm -rf $artifacts_dir mkdir -p $artifacts_dir touch $artifacts_dir/.ignore cd /home/jenkins freshadminvm $admin sleep 100 # time for the admin VM to boot
# rest of code runs on admin node: env | grep -e networking -e libvirt -e cloud > mkcloud.config scp mkcloud.config root@$admin: ret=0 ssh root@$admin "export cloud=$cloud; export UPDATEREPOS=$UPDATEREPOS ; export UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL=$UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL; export WITHREBOOT=$WITHREBOOT ; export TESTHEAD=$TESTHEAD ; export cloudsource=$cloudsource ; export libvirt_type=$libvirt_type ; export nodenumber=$nodenumber ; "' wget -Oqa_crowbarsetup.sh "https://raw.github.com/SUSE-Cloud/automation/master/scripts/qa_crowbarsetup.sh"
[ $WITHREBOOT == "true" ] && export rebootsteps="rebootcloud" [ $UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL == "true" ] && export updatesteps="addupdaterepo runupdate" timeout --signal=ALRM 150m bash -x -c ". qa_crowbarsetup.sh ; onadmin_runlist prepareinstallcrowbar addupdaterepo installcrowbar allocate $updatesteps waitcloud proposal testsetup $rebootsteps" ' || ret=$? echo "mkphyscloud ret=$ret" exit $ret
